sourcesContent:
<template>
  <the-header @name="show"></the-header>
  <the-message v-if="showed === 'ak'"></the-message>
  <the-about v-if="showed === 'about'"></the-about>





</template>

<script>
import TheHeader from './components/TheHeader.vue';
import TheMessage from './components/TheMessage.vue';
import TheAbout from './components/TheAbout.vue'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      showed: 'ak',
      
    }
  }, methods: {
    show(value) {
      this.showed = value;
      console.log(this.showed)
    }

  },
  created() {
    console.log(this.show);
  },
 components: {
  TheHeader, TheMessage, TheAbout
 }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
$stroke: #3c4043;
$shadow: #6B9080;
$body: #F6FFF8;
$med: #A4C3B2;
$light: #EAF4F4;
$r: 'Roboto';
$o: 'Alfa Slab One';
$c: 'Comic Neue';







</style>
